name: Pushy Knight
description:
Plans for future updates:

1. Character selection

2. Throwables

3. Multiplayer

4. Port to mobile

5. New bosses and enemies

Pushy Knight Discord

Thanks to: 

ramir "croc" - advertisement and concept artist

Mathis "Little Narwhal" Duguin - My go to coder. He really helped with fixing bugs/errors that I managed to create along the way.  Couldn't do it with out him.

Lucas "Lymze" Mendes Zoglio - Contributed to  all the UI art and some of the bosses!

AnimeNoodlesMHJ - Created the slime boss!

TurtleFlyte - Created most of the regular enemies.

Brayden “BRDN” Shotter - Created most of the music

sk00lestkidd - Created the main menu sound track

The tutorial song was created and given as a free sound track. All credit goes to Abstraction. Thank you for letting us use your song! 

"Three Red Hearts, Prepare to Dev Edition" by Abstraction (http://www.abstractionmusic.com)
